name: Entrapped (MKShadowZX)
description:
Please be warned that there are flashing images that may cause discomfort as well as dark subjects talked about in the game. 

A short RPG Maker Horror game made for the Finally Finished Something 2021 game jam.

Escape the castle and it's demented creatures while uncovering the dark secrets it has kept under wrapped.

Controls:

Z - Confirm/Enter

X - Back/Open Menu (Can also be opened via ESC key)

Arrow keys - Move character

All the above controls can be changed in the options.

F4 - Enter/Exit Fullscreen Mode

There will most likely be bugs and spelling errors, all of those will be updated in the future.

I hope you enjoy and please share feedback to make future games better! n.n
